programme.title: Fighting for Love - EP 5
programme.desc: The story follows A Mai, a female general of the founding era of the Southern Xia dynasty, who discards her feminine attire and dons battle armor, enduring hardships to become a legendary female warrior. A Mai, the daughter of the Duke of Jingguo in Southern Xia, witnesses her entire family being killed by her childhood friend Chen Qi. Years later, A Mai, now a young woman, disguises herself as a man and roams the martial world, seeking revenge against Chen Qi.

programme.title: Cinta Asli Si Bulu Mata Palsu
programme.desc: Reyna, who felt guilty towards Dewi and her mother, tried to apologize for her cousin's behavior. However, Dewi did not ask Reyna for compensation. Instead, Dewi wanted Reyna to introduce her to the man of her dreams, a handsome and wealthy man. Reyna transformed Dewi, who was a herbal medicine seller, into a beautiful woman with false eyelashes. From then on, Dewi became a playgirl who only wanted the wealth of the men she approached. Dewi's next target was Jodi, a handsome and wealthy man.

programme.title: ANAK BAND - EP 95
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Habis Stalking Terbitlah Overthinking

programme.desc: Poongodi rises above her father's male chauvinism, intent on proving herself & pursuing a college education. Her path crosses with Saravanan, a naïve young man who blindly trusts his manipulative stepmother. Uncover the fate of the two kindred souls.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: VINODHINI
programme.desc: When her husband, a soldier, disappears in a military accident, Vinothini never loses hope, firmly believing he'll come back. Join her inspiring journey as she cares for his family & meets life's hardships as a single mother with resilience & love

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace & heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds & win over her husband's large family.

programme.title: ilakkiya
programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gautham's controlling aunt Bairavi & her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.title: LAKSHMI
programme.desc: Maha, her family’s financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the family’s peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: ANANDA RAGAM
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.title: Movie- RAJA
programme.desc: Priya confesses her love to Raja but he mistakenly falls for a girl with the same name. Years later, Priya re-enters his life and triggers a series of emotionally complicated situations.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Movie contd - RAJA
programme.desc: Priya confesses her love to Raja but he mistakenly falls for a girl with the same name. Years later, Priya re-enters his life and triggers a series of emotionally complicated situations.

programme.title: Anuman
programme.desc: When Sita, the wife of Prince Rama of Ayodhya, is abducted by Ravana, the Asura king of Lanka, Rama sets out to liberate her with the help of various allies.

programme.title: Annam
programme.desc: Exuding warmth & courage, self-reliant Annam, living with an estranged father and a cruel stepmother, longs for a loving bond to escape her home. Will she find the love she seeks?

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her family’s happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: ETHIRNEECHAL THODARGIRADHU
programme.desc: Urged by her father, Janani is always a high achiever. But her marriage into a patriarchal family dashes her dream of a career. Thus begins Janani's arduous journey towards empowering her family's oppressed women to unleash their power.

programme.title: AADUKALAM
programme.desc: Sathya loves her sister like a second mother & believes compassion outweighs all riches. But, Selvanayagi, a woman of pride & privilege, worships money & social status. When their worlds collide, what trials will Sathya face in her fight for justice?

programme.title: Malli
programme.desc: Things take a momentous shift when a bold & loving village girl, Malli, crosses paths with a doting father and his 6-year-old daughter who yearns for a mother's love. Join the family's journey through the nuances of love, affection & parenthood.

programme.title: ANANDARAGAM - Serial
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.title: Objectif Monde - EP 1
programme.desc: In an increasingly fractured world, the twenty-seven Member States are struggling to find their place. With the rise of extremes within the Union itself and foreign interference aimed at destabilising democracies, the EU is more divided than ever and is even under attack from its historic allies. Investigation and debate.

programme.title: Olympe, Une Femme Dans La Revolution
programme.desc: Paris, 1793. Four years after the start of the Revolution. In this violent and changing society, women still have few rights. A woman of letters and a fighter, Olympe de Gouges opposed Robespierre head-on. Imprisoned alongside other convicts from all walks of life, she continued to fight.

programme.title: Movie - Naan Mirumagai Maara
programme.desc: Sound engineer Bhoominathan's violent crime crusade against his brother's brutal murderers earns the wrath of their enraged mercenary head. Will he succeed in his battle to save his family from the horde of mercenaries?

programme.title: Movie - Aanazhagan
programme.desc: Raja pretends to be a married woman in order to get a house for rent for his friends. However, things change after he falls for the landlady's daughter.

programme.title: Movie - Enga Veetu Ramayanam
programme.desc: Engaveetu Ramayanam is a 1987 Indian Tamil film directed by K. Chozha Raajan. The film stars Karthik and Illavarsi.

programme.title: Movie - Kurumbukaran
programme.desc: Kurumbukkaran is directed by Amirjan, featuring Janakaraj, K.S. Jayalaxmi, Aachi Manorama and Venniradai Moorthy.

programme.title: Movie - Senkoattai
programme.desc: After foiling an assassination attempt on the PM, CBI officer Shekhar follows the lead on a foreigner, Franka. This in turn leads him to a minister Thirumurthy, who is the real mastermind.

programme.title: Movie - Ammavin Kai Pesi
programme.desc: After being accused of theft, Annamalai leaves his house. His mother Ranganayaki desperately tries contacting him using a cell phone in order to ask him to return to save their house.

programme.title: Movie - Mouna Ragam
programme.desc: An unpretentious Divya, studying in college, is pressurised by her father to marry Chandrakumar. In grief after her ex-lover Manohar is killed, she tries to bite the bullet and get on with life.

programme.title: Movie - Mitta Mirasu
programme.desc: Chellaiya is at loggerheads with his uncle Masilamani and his two sons for backstabbing his father. Things take a turn when Chellaiya's brother and his wife grow closer to their uncle's family.

programme.title: Movie - Arasu
programme.desc: Thirunavukkarasu, a gentle soul, takes up the job of handling the temple accounts in Agraharam. Soon, he shows his true identity and seeks revenge against a dangerous criminal who is out of jail.

programme.title: Movie - Oorai Therinjukitten
programme.desc: Pandiyan, who loses his mother at a young age, becomes a conman to educate his sister. However, his life turns upside down when he is unable to settle the dowry for his sister's marriage.

programme.title: Movie - Nalla Pambu
programme.desc: A CID inspector involves himself in an undercover operation to put an end to the atrocities of a smuggler who kills people for his personal benefits.

programme.title: Movie - Vadaku Vaasal
programme.desc: Murali is an easy-going boy who falls in love with Priya from his college. Since her family is against their union, it creates problems for the lovers.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Ettu Patti Rasa
programme.desc: Singarasu is the guardian to a group of villages and goes about resolving disputes. However, he faces problems when he gets preoccupied with work and forgets about his wife.

programme.title: Movie - Maanbumigu Manavan
programme.desc: Shiva, a happy-go-lucky young man, helps two of his best friends get married, much to the dismay of their parents. When a woman is raped by Madan, Shiva and his friends seek to bring him to justice.

programme.title: Movie - Uttama Purushan
programme.desc: Raghu, a married man, tries to have an extra-marital affair with his secretary and asks her to come to a hotel room. However, he gets accused of murdering a woman who stayed in the neighbouring room.

programme.title: Movie - Aalukkoru Asai (New)
programme.desc: Arivalagan plans on leading a happy life by marrying an independent, educated girl. However, his life turns upside down when his orthodox grandparents force him to marry an illiterate woman.

programme.title: Movie - Koattai Mariamman

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2023/2024 (MNC)
programme.desc: The 2023/24 Premier League season will be forever remembered as one of the greatest campaigns ever. From an absorbing title race, Jurgen Klopp leaving Liverpool to Luton living the dream in the top-flight - Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: NETBUSTERS - EP 7
programme.desc: Fast-paced with music, ISO angles, and commentary, Netbusters offers an alternative review of every goal and key moment from the latest round of Premier League fixtures.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 47
programme.desc: We look back on the extraordinary career of Mohamed Salah, tracing his rise from a small village in Egypt to global football stardom. We speak to those closest to him to highlight his early years, struggles, and determination, shedding light on the pivotal moments that shaped his journey to becoming a Premier League legend with Liverpool.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 18
programme.desc: In 2024/25, AFC Bournemouth smashed their club record with 56 Premier League points, but less than 20 years earlier, they were drowning in debt and fighting for survival. This is the story of a club that defied the odds, silenced the doubters, and rose to become a certified Premier League contender, with their eyes set on Europe.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 8
programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: PL MASTERCLASS - EP 5
programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Morgan Rogers, Joelinton, Martin Odegaard and Ryan Gravenberch.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2018/2019 (GB: SALAH, MANE, AUBAMEYANG)
programme.desc: We take a look back at some of the most spectacular and important goals from previous Premier League seasons.

programme.title: NETBUSTERS - ERLING HAALAND SPECIAL
programme.desc: Netbusters provides an alternative look at the weekends matches - all of the goals, key saves, misses and tackles in a fun, fast-paced 26 minutes.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: We celebrate the greatest goalscorers in Premier League history; the icons whose instinct, power, and flair have lit up stadiums and etched their names into footballing folklore. From Alan Shearer's relentless consistency to Thierry Henry's elegance, Sergio Aguero's killer instinct to Harry Kane's rise, we relive the moments that defined an era.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 17
programme.desc: Maya Yoshida quietly became one of the Premier League's most dependable defenders during his years at Southampton, but his influence reached far beyond the pitch. In this episode, we look back at Yoshida's journey from Japan to England's top-flight, his role as a leader for club and country, and the cultural bridge he helped build along the way.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2003/2004 season.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 2
programme.desc: Former England and Premier League goalkeeper David James takes on 1-to-11, naming his ultimate lineup from the best players he shared the pitch with. Across spells at Liverpool, Aston Villa, West Ham, Manchester City, and Portsmouth, James played alongside some of the league's biggest names. It's a team built on world-class ability, big personalities, and plenty of memorable moments.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 17
programme.desc: Mario Melchiot recalls his Premier League journey, which began as part of an ambitious Chelsea team. The Dutch defender played in the Blues' high-stakes final day clash in 2003 with Liverpool, before moving to Birmingham City and then captaining Wigan Athletic.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 4
programme.desc: Marcelo Bielsa brought Premier League football back to Leeds in 2020, following a 16 year exile from the top flight. Amidst the backdrop of a global pandemic, Bielsa's full-throttle tactics made Leeds the story of the season. Stuart Dallas recalls the highlights.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2020/2021 (MNC)
programme.desc: A review of all the best goals, action and drama from Premier League seasons past.

programme.desc: Netbusters provides an alternative look at the weekends matches - all of the goals, key saves, misses and tackles in a fun, fast-paced 26 minutes.

programme.desc: Fast-paced with music, ISO angles, and commentary, Netbusters offers an alternative review of every goal and key moment from the latest round of Premier League fixtures.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 9
programme.desc: Since joining Liverpool in 2023, Cody Gakpo has become a key figure at Anfield - playing a major role in their Premier League title win last season. This week, The Big Interview sits down with the Netherlands international to learn about his rise, at the PSV academy from the age of six, to winning one of football's biggest prizes.

programme.desc: A review of all the best goals, action and drama from Premier League seasons past.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2014/2015 season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 11
programme.desc: When Arne Slot guided Liverpool to their 20th League title in his debut season, it marked the beginning of a new era, yet echoed a familiar tradition. Explore the rich legacy of Liverpool's managerial transitions, where through decades of change, one constant endures: the club's remarkable ability to evolve and triumph, through seamless succession.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 19
programme.desc: We chart the remarkable journey of one of the Premier League's most iconic midfielders, Yaya Toure, from his humble beginnings in Bouake, Ivory Coast, to his rise through European football's elite clubs. We sit down with Toure to discuss his development at ASEC Mimosas, his path playing with the likes of Monaco and Barcelona, and his eventual arrival at Manchester City, where he became a driving force behind the club's transformation into a football powerhouse.

programme.desc: Edwin van der Sar has faced down pressure on the biggest stages in world football, but his toughest battle came after retirement. In 2023, the legendary goalkeeper suffered a life-threatening brain haemorrhage. In this episode Edwin opens up on his recovery and looks back on his career at the top that redefined goalkeeping.

programme.desc: Now an Arsenal Legend, Ian Wright nearly walked away from the game after being rejected for a string of trials as a youngster. But here he tells us how he not only made it to the top, but how he carved his name into Arsenal folklore and became one of only 16 footballers to be inducted into the Premier League Hall of Fame.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 6
programme.desc: He scored 104 Premier League goals, making 55 assists in 254 English top flight matches for Chelsea. It's no wonder then that four time Premier League winner Didier Drogba has earned a seat amongst the top table elite, after being inducted into the Premier League Hall of Fame. We talk to him and those that knew him best about what set him apart from others in the game, reflecting on his incredible career and his lasting legacy.

programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: WCCB Tim Tszyu vs. Sebastian Fundora
programme.desc: From the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, undefeated Super Welterweight World Champion Tim Tszyu travels from Australia to defend his title against former World Champion Sebastian Fundora. Fundora stands 6'5", and is known for his all-action and exciting style. He replaces an injured Keith Thurman, and jumps into a World Title match-up against one of boxing's rising stars in Tszyu.

programme.title: WCCB Demetrius Andrade vs. Demond Nicholson
programme.desc: Undefeated former WBO Middleweight World Champion Demetrius Andrade moves up to Super Middleweight for the first time, taking on Demond Nicholson. Nicholson is coming off three straight victories including two by knockout, following a tough decision loss to knockout artist Edgar Berlanga. Andrade has accumulated a perfect 31-0 record, including five straight defenses of the Middleweight World Championship. Watch as he makes his entrance into the Super Middleweight division, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Derrell Coley vs. Kip Diggs / Fernando Vargas vs. Jose Morales
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another excitingGreatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. In a fight for the vacant NABF Welterweight Championship, evenly matched Derrell Coley (29-1-2) and Kip Diggs (27-2) square off in what would be a classic back-and-forth battle, with multiple knockdowns and a fight to close to call on the judges' scorecards.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Jean Pascal
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight championship contest featuring Bernard Hopkins and Jean Pascal meeting for a second time. Their original contest, just five months earlier, resulted in a controversial draw, and the WBC ordered a rematch. Also on the card, action from young heavyweight stud Deontay Wilder.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Paul Williams vs. Kermit Cintron
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features former champions Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (38-1, 27 KOs) and 'El Asesino' Kermit Cintron (32-2, 28 KOs) in a middleweight battle. The fight took place at the Home Depot Center in Carson, California, USA, on May 8, 2010.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Fukuoka, Japan welcomes the top talent in the world of martial arts when Karate 1 Premier League returns. Fukuoka will host athletes from across the globe including last season's Grand Winners such as Hikaru Ono and Ayaka Saito competing in their home country. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League visits the port city of Fukuoka, Japan, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Sergio Martinez vs. Matthew Macklin
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a middleweight title fight between Sergio Martinez and Matthew Macklin. Also on the card, action from a young Adrien Broner and Cuban sensation Yuriorkis Gamboa.

programme.title: Bipolar Rock n' Roller
programme.desc: A raw and unflinching account of Mauro Ranallo's decades-long struggle with Bipolar Affective Disorder. The voice of WWE and Showtime Championship Boxing, Ranallo has called some of the biggest sports events in history - all the while fighting his own epic battles with mental health Follow his journey in this 3-part series, as he combats the stigma behind mental health issues and sheds light on what it's like being at the top of the industry despite seemingly insurmountable odds.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 2
programme.desc: The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 3
programme.desc: When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 4
programme.desc: Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Water, water, everywhere - there's a flood in our hospital soap opera! Grown-up Tag the firefighter splashes around. It's a good job grown-up Happy the lifeguard is on hand

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 12

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 23
programme.desc: When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 24
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 25
programme.desc: Dad agrees to take Bluey and Bingo to the shops to buy an ice-cream if they can get him into the car. Only problem is... he's just entered 'Ragdoll' mode!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 97
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa‐Laa and Po follow a trail of flowers which leads them to some very special treasure.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing as they play Peekaboo.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 34
programme.desc: Plom is looking after some new furry friends, specifically a heard of Alpacas. But when the Poppacas end up wandering off into the unknown, Plom has to find a way to get them back.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 48
programme.desc: Pug is being competitive when he cleans the bookshop. He and Dog join a race in Australia. They help brother and sister Kangaroos who are very competitive, but get stuck in the mud.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: Lofty's giant sneezes go a long way, so Messy and his friends must help to wash OKIDO clean of all the bad germs flying around!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: Messy and friends explore the forest with Tweedy. When her eyesight fails, Zim, Zam and Zoom lend a hand.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 36
programme.desc: The Kazoops house is feeling a bit crowded, so Monty imagines what it would be like if he and Jimmy Jones lived by themselves.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: Gran Gran's keys get stuck behind the sofa. Inspired by inventors from the past, JoJo and Gran Gran invent a 'key collector' to get them back!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 4
programme.desc: After visiting Jared's shop, JoJo and Gran Gran set up their own shop at home - if you pay with panda pounds, you can buy anything and everything.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 16
programme.desc: The little girl and her feathery friend have a sleepover with some friends, but struggle to get to nod off.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 17
programme.desc: The duo think they are heading to the zoo, but the bus takes a surprising diversion.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 20
programme.desc: Thomas is asked to help at the animal park for the day and realizes that it also involves being decorated as a monkey.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 6
programme.desc: Dad and his mates hit the backyard, ready to rip up some tree stumps! But when Bluey and Bingo take over a stump as a nail salon, Dad finds he's got some negotiating to do.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 7
programme.desc: When Bluey accidentally makes Bingo upset playing a game at dinner, she will do anything to make her happy again - even changing the rules of the game. But nothing seems to work.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 8
programme.desc: Dad refuses to be late dropping off Bluey and Bingo at kindy and school, but the girls make Dad play so many games, they quickly derail his plan.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 9
programme.desc: Supertato and the Veggies have built a super sandcastle, but Evil Pea wants to storm it by firing her hordes of Mini Peas at it with her pea shooter.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 33
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels are out doing a bit of sailing. What fun! When Tag starts to feel a little bit seasick Duggee suggests a stop off at the Island for a spot of lunch, but where's all the food?

programme.desc: Tag is having trouble sleeping, so Duggee offers him a few tricks to help him.

programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch builds his effigy in ice, his digging threatens the Lambert Glacier in Antarctica.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Grandmaster Glitch's giant ball game threatens El Castillo in Chichen Itza, Mexico, so the Go Jetters attempt to save it.

programme.desc: Lexi is cooking Welsh Glamorgan Sausages using two Welsh ingredients: Caerphilly cheese and leeks. Will Lexi's friends like the taste of the leek when they try her recipe?

programme.desc: Andy, Jen and Scout head to Chihuahua, Northern Mexico to discover how a colony of black tailed prairie dogs protect their pups from prowling bull snakes, hawks and coyotes as the pups take their critical first steps above ground.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 5
programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed have invented a new game knocking down bottles with coconuts; they have called it 'Bowling'.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 6

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 7

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 8

programme.desc: Tim Rex in Space: T-Rex Tim, his big brother Tommy, little sister Tia and Triceratops bestie Kai tackle kid-shaped problems with dino-sized solutions in space!

programme.desc: Rubble moves with his family of construction pups to the nearby town of Builder Cove where they live, play, and build whatever the community needs.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 - EP 301
programme.desc: Rubble moves with his family of construction pups to the nearby town of Builder Cove where they live, play, and build whatever the community needs.

programme.desc: Now there's more to explore with DORA! Join Dora, the world's favorite exploradora, along with her best friend Boots as they journey through a magical rainforest where anything can happen-and usually does! ¡Vamonos!

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: The Sky Torcher & Flame Throwers invade the Crystal Realm. Tom must conquer his demons and bond with the Fault Ripper to defeat the Sky Torcher.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Dinotrux S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: D-Structs loses his wrecking ball tail and wants to prove he's still dangerous, but when he gets stuck the crew must decide if they will save him.

programme.title: Dinotrux S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools' home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a race-loser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: When a mother kangaroo hops away with Wally's hat on her head and Fritz in her pouch, Wally, Wenda and Odlulu must work together. They use the Talk to Animals Keys to track the runaway kangaroo through the Australian Outback.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S3 - EP 117
programme.desc: Buttercup and Daisy find some stars in flowertot garden. They think they have fallen out of the sky and try to return them.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Pat-Pat wants to play detective for the day with Noddy, but the only problem is that they don't have a case to solve... that is until the Pockets go missing. Where can they be? It's up to Noddy and Pat Pat to investigate!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: Marsha overhears the others saying she is too bossy. She decides that Silver hatch would be a better place without her. Chaos swiftly ensues, can Marsha be persuaded to stay, they can't cope without her!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: Big Chris is working on Loada while the others plan a surprise evening for him for being the longest serving member of Silver hatch

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: Raa Raa is waiting for the beautiful Bell Flowers to open but can the fidgety lion sit still long enough to see one

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion S2 - EP 14

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 15

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: Kitty Ranger Team Leader Mama Box helps Kitty Ranger Gabby and Pandy get a lost Baby Me-Owl back home to its Mama in the Fairy Tale Garden. They embark on a hiking adventure! They learn about animal tracking, earn patches along the way, and ultimately, reunite Baby with Mama!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: When Eep and Dawn find a stranded egg, they eagerly take it in as their new pet, but when they learn the egg is not what it seems, they have to return it before it becomes dangerous.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it’s revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally "loses" Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores (Cakey's Bakery, Baby Box's Craft Emporium, Kitty Fairy's Flower Shoppe) to earn kitty coins and save up for a melodicat at the Grand Opening of DJ Catnip’s Music Store!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isn’t good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what he’s feeling.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize he’s missing home. / Kelp feels like he can’t choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Artephius tries to warn the town when an evil mouse charms his way into San Lorenzo - but no one will listen to him.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: Cleevil, an orphan goblin, seeks refuge in San Lorenzo - but, unbeknownst to Puss, he is in cahoots with the Duchess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhmini’s hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years she’s been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: To bring peace to his kingdom, King Julien "civilizes" a Foosa.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: King Julien discovers diapers and brings style to his lemur subjects, igniting a fashion war.

programme.desc: Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can_x000D_the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.desc: When Gran announces it’s time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she’s got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.desc: Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own - Wu and Wei.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D’Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D’Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 3

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes pictures with silly filters, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse!

programme.desc: When Odlulu uses the Bubble Key to raise a sunken ship in the Bahamas, the Wanderers and Wizard Doubloon must take to the high-seas to catch this bubble-wielding buccaneer before she makes away with the ship's booty.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: When Farmer Tom's cabbages go missing, Pat-Pat thinks there must be a cabbage monster on the loose! Noddy's not so sure but then Driver Dylan tells Noddy he's just seen a monster! What if Pat Pat was right? Noddy investigates: where is the cabbage monster?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Everyone in Toyland is ready to board Train for the 'Big Day Out', but Train runs off down the tracks without any passengers! Why did Train drive away? Noddy investigates to literally save the day.

programme.desc: Raa Raa and his friends are racing their vehicles through the Jingly Jangly Jungle but who will win

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: When Gabby, Pandy, and Carlita prepare for the annual Meow-Mazing Games, they encounter stiff competition from the Doodads and must work together to bring home the coveted dollhouse trophy.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: It’s Pandy’s birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! Gabby goes room to room preparing all his favorite things for the party, but when the big moment comes, Pandy drops his cake! Gabby consoles him and tells him it’s even better - now, they have smash cake! They all hold up a piece and pose for a picture.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: When Grug overhears Thunk accidentally call Phil "Dad", he tries to reconnect with Thunk by taking him to the natural spectacle known as "Big Shine."

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his "big bad" year on the zodiac calendar - which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he "breaks up" with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover. They help her conquer her fears and enjoy her first sleepover.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it’s movie night in the dollhouse! Demanding Director CatRat leads the Gabby Cats through a Gabby-fied version of a classic story, Gabby-locks and the Three Bears.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: Rumors of scary sea monsters in the East End take the kids on a journey of discovering you shouldn’t believe everything you hear. / Mysterious globs disturbing the ocean turn out to be the byproduct of food from Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.desc: When Rodney heads to the Community Center for Junior Security Cadet picture day, TZG secretly helps him stay neat and clean for the photo shoot. / When Luis worries about his first ever math test, TZG secretly helps steady his nerves.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: New girl in town Felicia shows off her robo-dog but it runs out of control, and TZG must secretly stop the barking bot from wreaking havoc. / When Lula starts gathering birthday wishes from folks around town, TZG secretly keeps her surprise party under wraps.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: Dulcinea finds a wishing star and decides to use it to help San Lorenzo, but all of her wishes wind up in chaos.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: Toby's ninja brother Brandt returns to San Lorenzo, and Puss agrees to help him reunite with his brothers - to get them out of town.

programme.desc: The team plans a heist in order to obtain the enchanted pendant that can lead them to the storm wheels. Elsewhere, Klaus and Veruca shipwreck on a mysterious island that is actually home to the mages, and also the Tianshang weapon helmet.

programme.title: Iconic Australia S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: The iconic sails of the Sydney Opera House were set to revamp the image of Australia when the building opened in October 1973, but preceding this was a dramatic construction saga that could rival any opera.

programme.title: Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Explore the boundless potential of coconuts with Lauren as she reinvents a calamari dish using coconut flesh offering a taste experience that will leave you in awe and redefine your culinary perceptions.

programme.title: Adam and Poh's Great Australian Bites S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Adam and Poh are heading to Tasmania on a quest to put together a not-so humble version of a classic Aussie Pie. They'll even attempt to answer the most controversial question of all... Do you want sauce with that?

programme.title: Landline(2025) - EP 35
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Offsiders (2025) - EP 36
programme.desc: As attention turns to the summer sports, Abbey Gelmi and the panel cover the week's action including the Women's ODI World Cup Cricket, NBL, AFLW, football, Spring Racing Carnival and more.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S5 - EP 34
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani Gray and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 204
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 204
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 204
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: A Bite To Eat With Alice S2 - EP 34
programme.desc: Alice surprises comedian Georgie Carroll with a healthy jalapeno falafel dish. Georgie reveals to Alice how she decided to give nursing the chop, while Alice attempts to prove that chilli non carne can be delicious.

programme.title: Field To Feast S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Thanh visits the biggest mushroom farm in Australia and compares their produce to wild foraged pine mushrooms, all to be enjoyed using an unconventional cooking approach.

programme.title: A Brief History Of Cricket Down Under: The 80s S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: The '80s had its fair share of thrilling matches. Relive highlights from some of the most memorable battles on Australian soil in matches that had everything - heroes and villains, plenty of drama and nail-biting finishes.

programme.title: Restoration Australia S6 - EP 2
programme.desc: Host Anthony Burke meets a King Islander returning home to one of Australia's most remote and weatherbeaten outposts to reclaim and restore a derelict farmhouse.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. The series’ signature "A Closer Look" segment has garnered millions of views and is widely lauded for its tightly written and thoughtful approach to analyzing and satirizing news of the day.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers

programme.title: Meet The Press 2025 - EP 41
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. Every Sunday morning for more than 70 years, millions of Americans have tuned in to get answers from U.S. and world leaders, and to hear analysis, discussion and review of the week's political events from noted journalists and experts.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.desc: Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: CNBC’s longest running feature show. For over 20 years Christine Tan has been talking to people who are shaping, governing and leading the Asia-Pacific region in this multi-award award winning show.

programme.title: Who Owns
programme.desc: Is that space public or private? Who Owns…? looks into privately-owned "public" areas and the implications for the people who use them.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Rising dramatically from the plains of southern Malawi, Mount Mulanje is a soaring granite massif known as the "Island in the Sky." It is home to a fragile and unique ecosystem and at its heart stands the Mulanje cedar (Widdringtonia whytei), a tree so rare it's found nowhere else on Earth. Once covering vast slopes of the mountain, the cedar is now critically endangered.

programme.title: Showtime
programme.desc: Jennifer Lopez performed at Abu Dhabi's Etihad Arena in July, one of dozens of events that take place here every year. Stars like her regularly steal the show. But we are shifting the spotlight to the men and women that bring these performances to life. We go behind the scenes at both the JLo concert and the Arenacross World Championship, seeing firsthand how these shows make it on stage.

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: Larry Madowo sits down with Grammy-winning singer Tems in Lagos to trace her journey from bedroom producer to global icon. She opens up about her creative process, meteoric rise, and her mission to empower women through her Leading Vibe Initiative, offering an intimate look at an artist reshaping global music on her own terms.

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East
programme.desc: The Middle East is undergoing a healthcare revolution, with cutting-edge medical technology, increased investment, and world-class facilities transforming the sector. At the forefront of this change is Sir Magdi Yacoub, the renowned British-Egyptian heart surgeon whose groundbreaking work has saved countless lives. Now, he's bringing his expertise home with the launch of a state-of-the-art hospital in Cairo, set to become a regional center of excellence in cardiac care and research.

programme.title: Connecting Africa

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Rising dramatically from the plains of southern Malawi, Mount Mulanje is a soaring granite massif known as the "Island in the Sky." It is home to a fragile and unique ecosystem and at its heart stands the Mulanje cedar (Widdringtonia whytei), a tree so rare it's found nowhere else on Earth. Once covering vast slopes of the mountain, the cedar is now critically endangered.

programme.title: All Japan Tennis Championships "Women's Singles Final"
What the Villains Have to Say
programme.desc: Cockroaches, Carbon dioxide, Unwanted hair... Villains are anathema to the public as being "dirty, noxious, and ugly." But even villains have a point they want you to hear! In this program, we look at their amazing abilities revealed by the latest research, as well as the real villains, who are actually a little bit fascinating!

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 39 (R)
programme.desc: Tsutaju, having established the jihon wholesaler merchant guild, cleverly wins over the officials and releases three of Santo Kyoden’s works as a bundled edition, sold in wrappers labeled "Kyokun Yomihon", which means 'a didactic reader'. Meanwhile, devastated by the loss of Kiyo (Fujima Sawako), Utamaro leaves Edo with Tsuyo. Months later, "Kyokun Yomihon" is banned, and both Tsutaju and Kyoden are taken into custody.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE (R)

programme.title: ASEAN⋅Korea Music Festival 2025 ROUND in Malaysia
programme.desc: A public cultural diplomacy project designed to broaden the Korea-ASEAN cooperation relationship and provide a venue for cultural exchange among Asian youth through popular music. programme.title: Destined - EP 2
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru, the daughter of a cloth merchant who's suffered childhood hardships and she is married to Gu Jiu Si who is the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Destined - EP 3
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru, the daughter of a cloth merchant who's suffered childhood hardships and she is married to Gu Jiu Si who is the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: The Long River - EP 29
programme.desc: After a huge flood during the 15th year of his reign, the young Emperor Kang Xi conducts civil service examinations to recruit talented individuals to solve the problems plaguing the Yellow River, allowing the 24-year-old Chen Huang an opportunity to come to the fore.

programme.title: Our Generation - EP 16
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Lin Qile and Jiang Qiaoxi reconnect in high school after a childhood friendship and a lingering misunderstanding. As they navigate youth's ups and downs alongside their classmates, they grow through shared experiences and step into new horizons.

programme.title: Our Generation - EP 17
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Lin Qile and Jiang Qiaoxi reconnect in high school after a childhood friendship and a lingering misunderstanding. As they navigate youth's ups and downs alongside their classmates, they grow through shared experiences and step into new horizons.

programme.title: Family By Choice - EP 8
programme.desc: Three unrelated individuals - Jin Sanha (Hwang In Yeop), Yoon Joowan (Jung Chae Yeon), and Kang Haijoon (Bae Hyun Sung) - become family for each other due to changes in their respective families. Ten years later, the trio reunite, kicking off a youthful romance.

programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 2
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang'an.

programme.title: Eternity - EP 18
programme.desc: Stunt man Fung (Alex Fong) and Inspector Yeung were good friends and they were wooing the same girl, Wai (Jessica Hester Hsuan). Wai chosed Fung and they went on a holiday in Xi’an. There, Fung met a girl named Hung (Faye Wong), whom he had faint memory of her saving him twenty years ago. Yet he was astonished as Hung looked the same without aging a bit. Since then, his mind was preoccupied with Hung.

programme.title: My Sister of Eternal Flower - EP 10
programme.desc: FA LAI-CHU (Charmaine Sheh) is a kindhearted and innocent woman with the IQ of a ten-year-old. When her parents passed away, she shouldered the responsibility for the care of her younger sister and brother.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes IV - EP 19
programme.desc: Senior Chemist of Forensic Science Division Ko On (Raymond Wong), Senior Forensic Pathologist Man Ka-hei (Selena Lee) and Kowloon West Regional Crime Unit Senior Inspector Kwok Fai-wong (Shaun Tam) are the pillars of Crime Busting Trio leading a team of outstanding individuals. They unravel appalling schemes by using advanced forensic science. Their mastery of pathology enables them to decode secrets of the human anatomy.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes IV - EP 20
programme.desc: Senior Chemist of Forensic Science Division Ko On (Raymond Wong), Senior Forensic Pathologist Man Ka-hei (Selena Lee) and Kowloon West Regional Crime Unit Senior Inspector Kwok Fai-wong (Shaun Tam) are the pillars of Crime Busting Trio leading a team of outstanding individuals. programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 9
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Eternity - EP 17
programme.desc: Stunt man Fung (Alex Fong) and Inspector Yeung were good friends and they were wooing the same girl, Wai (Jessica Hester Hsuan). Wai chosed Fung and they went on a holiday in Xi’an. There, Fung met a girl named Hung (Faye Wong), whom he had faint memory of her saving him twenty years ago. Yet he was astonished as Hung looked the same without aging a bit. Since then, his mind was preoccupied with Hung.

programme.title: My Sister of Eternal Flower - EP 10
programme.desc: FA LAI-CHU (Charmaine Sheh) is a kindhearted and innocent woman with the IQ of a ten-year-old. When her parents passed away, she shouldered the responsibility for the care of her younger sister and brother.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes IV - EP 19
programme.desc: Senior Chemist of Forensic Science Division Ko On (Raymond Wong), Senior Forensic Pathologist Man Ka-hei (Selena Lee) and Kowloon West Regional Crime Unit Senior Inspector Kwok Fai-wong (Shaun Tam) are the pillars of Crime Busting Trio leading a team of outstanding individuals. They unravel appalling schemes by using advanced forensic science. Their mastery of pathology enables them to decode secrets of the human anatomy.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes IV - EP 20
programme.desc: Senior Chemist of Forensic Science Division Ko On (Raymond Wong), Senior Forensic Pathologist Man Ka-hei (Selena Lee) and Kowloon West Regional Crime Unit Senior Inspector Kwok Fai-wong (Shaun Tam) are the pillars of Crime Busting Trio leading a team of outstanding individuals. They unravel appalling schemes by using advanced forensic science. Their mastery of pathology enables them to decode secrets of the human anatomy.

programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 9
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 10
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Lady Flower Fist - EP 16
programme.desc: Mui Tsui Fa (Kwan Wing Ho) met Fong Tak (Kong Wa), the richest man in Guangzhou, when she visited her father. They had some misunderstandings and were against each other. Then, Fa offended the General and she had to marry Tak to avoid being punished. Fa, in becoming Tak‘s fourth concubine, aroused jealousy and hate in Tak’s house._x000D__x000D_The Tso Sect leader held a contest to seek a husband for his daugher, Siu Wan (Chan Siu Ha). Fa won the match in a man‘s disguise.

programme.title: The Stamp of Love - EP 5
programme.desc: KIM (HEUNG HOI LAN, ANNE) is a Malaysian. She marries a Hong Kong man, WAN (LAU DAN), in order to improve her family’s living standard. When she arrives in Hong Kong, she is very confused. She accidentally knocks out a stranger, MAN (KWONG WA), in the street. On the wedding day, WAN suddenly dies from a heart attack, so Kim’s dream of staying in Hong Kong is destroyed. _x000D__x000D_ With the help of WAN’s tenant, she finds a job.

programme.title: The Beauty Of War - EP 1
programme.desc: Chung Ka-po (Jeannie Chan), Lam Siu-mei (Hera Chan) and Lee Ching-yee (Moon Lau) are sisterly buddies. Due to different reasons after graduation, the trio gradually go their separate ways. Ka-po is arbitrarily nominated by Siu-mei to participate in a school beauty contest organized by some magazine. Ka-po is eventually the unchallenged winner, and the Golden Agent Wing Yat-yin (Joel Chan) then convinces her to join his agency. Yat-yin encourages Ka-po to sign up for the Miss Hong Kong Pageant.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery II, A - EP 11
programme.desc: After a radical change in life, SZE SAI-LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah) becomes dispirited with the political world and spends most of his time travelling around in search of fun. Along the way, he meets a spirit medium, NG KWAN-YAU (Hsuan Jessica Hester), who somehow gets caught up in a mysterious murder case. It is not LUN’s intention to intervene at first, but with the fortuitous assistance from the pillow spirit NGAU TAI-LIK (Lee Sze Chit), he can finally crack the case and prove YAU’s innocence.

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart - EP 35
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kin’s footsteps and joined the force.

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart - EP 36
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kin’s footsteps and joined the force.
